As PSP Container Property

Short Name: AsPSPContainer

Property of PSP Variable Object.

Converts the class of a reference from PSP Variable Object to PSP Variable Container. Because some variable objects, such as network-published I/O variables, function as both PSP Variables and PSP Containers, you might need to use the As PSP Variable and As PSP Container properties to refer to the same variable object both as a PSP Variable and as a PSP Container.

Data Type

PSP Container reference

Permissions

Read Only
